Detailed Description

The class PbFfsNumberHandler will be used to change, write and read phone numbers. All phone numbers will be stored in a file on FFS.

void PbFfsNumberHandler::Init (   )  [virtual]
 

Class initialisation; File with saved phone book entry will be read from FFS. If no file is existing a new file will be created.

Reimplemented from PbRecordHandler.
